products.title: Café Style Hampton Silk White Faux Wood Shutter
products.metadescription: Café Style Hampton Silk White Faux Wood Shutter in White. Made to measure from £58.99 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Faux Wood Shutter includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Bask in the benefits of fitted window shutters with this bright and breezy, café style option in silk white. The half height gives you all privacy you need, whilst you can enjoy a sense of space and loads of light. 
 The Hampton range provides resilient PVC shutters that are ideal for updating bathrooms and Kitchens with a lasting fresh finish. 
 
 Product ID: DB-SHU0027 Fabric Colour: Silk White Material: PVC     Control Type: Centre Tilt Rod or Louvre Tilt Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.productdescription:
Window shutters from the Hampton range offer a unique addition to your décor, boasting versatility whatever the weather, and unwavering style that is sure to impress. 
 Made from durable PVC, these shutters provide a waterproof option for bathrooms and kitchens. The classic, full height design is made even more timeless with a subtle colouring in silk white.

products.title: Full Height Boston Silk White Craft Wood Shutter
products.metadescription: Full Height Boston Silk White Craft Wood Shutter in White. Made to measure from £69.66 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Craft Wood Shutter includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
With a quality, craft wood construction, the Boston range of shutters will beautifully dress your windows. Simple, clean lines and reliable functionality make these plantation shutters ideal for both classic and contemporary interiors. 
 The full height of these shutters combined with the warm, off-white finish, will add charm and character to your home. 
 
 Product ID: DB-SHU0002 Fabric Colour: Silk White Material: MDF Craft Wood     Control Type: Centre Tilt Rod or Louvre Tilt Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes
